caption.center: Brian SHAW v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Yalobusha County Circuit Court, Second Judicial District, Andrew Cleveland Baker, Ruling Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Sherry S. Fernandez, Hernando, for appellant.
Michael C. Moore, Atty. Gen., DeWitt T. Allred, III, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., Jackson, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before DAN M. LEE, P.J., and McRAE and SMITH, JJ.
